subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Already serving a one-year suspension from the N.F.L., Pacman Jones will face two felony charges stemming from a strip club disturbance in February that led to three people being shot.
snippet: Already serving a one-year suspension from the N.F.L., Pacman Jones will face two felony charges stemming from a strip club disturbance in February that led to three people being shot.
